20110112194415.000|20110112194415.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with

20110112194417.000|20110112194420.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110112194420.000|20110112194420.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection

20110112194424.000|20110112194425.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110112194425.000|20110112194425.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110112194425.000|20110112194428.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110112194428.000|20110112194428.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110112194428.000|20110112194431.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110112194431.000|20110112194431.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110112194431.000|20110112194433.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110112194433.000|20110112194433.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]

20110112194441.000|20110112194442.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20110112194442.000|20110112194444.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.

20110112194444.000|20110112194446.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor

20110112194450.000|20110112194452.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110112194452.000|20110112194452.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone

20110112194454.000|20110112194456.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,
